column4: The average load factor in the UK’s offshore wind portfolio in 2014 was 38% (p.11)  it is anticipated that some future UK projects adopting emerging technology may exceed a 50% load factor.

column1: Statkraft UK (2015) Offshore wind: delivering more for less (p.12)
column4: Based on conversations with the wind industry, the range given in the Statkraft report is a bit misleading on the low end as it includes repowering. So bottom end of the range excluding repowering is 2025: £77/MWh and 2030: £70/MWh. Statkraft data were in 2015 calendar £ hence we converted them into 2012 fiscal £
